tika-s0301t8:71_9: Bhagavā attano buddhañāṇameva mantaṁ katvā dīpento “āma, vaṅgīsa,

tika-s0301t8:75_6: Ye niyāmagataddasāti ye bhikkhū ariyā buddhānaṁ sāvakā phalaṭṭhabhāvena niyāmagatā ceva maggaṭṭhabhāvena niyāmadasā ca.
